abstract: Citigroup announced on Wednesday that it would cut 11,000 jobs, reducing its work force by roughly 4 percent, as the bank moved to sharply reduce its expenses.
snippet: Citigroup announced on Wednesday that it would cut 11,000 jobs, reducing its work force by roughly 4 percent, as the bank moved to sharply reduce its expenses.

headline.main: Citigroup to Cut 11,000 Jobs and Take $1 Billion Charge
headline.print_headline: Citigroup Says It Will Cut 11,000 Jobs and Take a $1 Billion Charge
